Edged U.S. | Our Team Meet the leadership team Jakob Carnemark Founder https://www.linkedin.com/in/jakob-carnemark-b93b079/ A veteran entrepreneur and builder in the data center industry, Jake focuses on new approaches to improve infrastructure deployment for IT and sustainable energy. Jake has over 30 years of experience building and operating data centers and mission critical infrastructure for companies such as Skanska, IBM, Telus, Goldman Sachs and other industry leaders. As Founder and CEO of Endeavour, Jake is overseeing the rollout of a new generation of grid-interactive edge infrastructure. Bryant Farland Chief Executive Officer https://www.linkedin.com/in/bryant-farland-7a7065a/ Bryant is a senior executive with more than two decades of experience in the critical infrastructure industry. As CEO of Edged Data Centers, Bryant oversees the rapid North American rollout of the Edged sustainable data center platform and its supporting technologies. Bryant is a proven leader with experience across the full project lifecycle, from design to delivery to successful operations. Royce Thomas Chief Revenue Officer https://www.linkedin.com/in/roycethomas/ Royce is a leading sales expert in the digital infrastructure and telecommunications industry with more than 30 years of experience in global sales, business development and marketing. He is responsible for the overall customer experience and go-to-market strategy, including driving revenue growth, identifying strategic partnerships and building a world-class sales and customer service organization. He brings long-term, established relationships with the largest cloud and hyperscale customers and a proven ability to scale businesses, successfully implement new
systems and inspire top-performing teams. Mitch Fonseca Chief Operating Officer https://www.linkedin.com/in/mitchfonseca/ As Chief Operating Officer, Mitch is responsible for the overall design, construction and operation of the companyâs rapidly expanding North American portfolio. He is a seasoned industry leader with more than 15 years of experience successfully scaling organizations and delivering exceptional operations, planning and delivery of enterprise-class technology and telecommunications products and services for global Fortune 100 companies. Christine Wyatt-Townsley Chief Human Resources Officer https://www.linkedin.com/in/christinewyatttownsley/ Christine is a seasoned HR leader with over 20+ years of experience developing and leading people, culture programs and teams across diverse industries including critical infrastructure and technology. As the Chief Human Resources Officer at Edged, Christine is responsible for all aspects of HR. She is focused on building culture and teams that are inclusive, innovative, and high performing. John Callahan Chief Investment Officer https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-callahan-6bb20b2a/ John is the senior executive responsible for overseeing the companyâs investment strategy and driving continued financial growth. He has broad experience across the lifecycle of investments from originations to equity and debt financing, asset management, and disposition. Prior to joining Edged, John led the investment of billions of equity across various asset classes, including data centers, and started several real estate operating businesses. Scott Silverman Chief Financial Officer https://www.linkedin.com/in/scott-silverman-0414b43/ Scott is a top financial advisor with over 30 years of experience working in the design/build/finance industry. He has supported numerous multi-billion-dollar projects for mission critical infrastructure and brings deep expertise in strategic planning, technology, project controls, accounting, capital management and more. As Chief Financial Officer, Scott plays a pivotal role in driving the companyâs financial performance, managing risk and advancing strategic growth initiatives. Martin Triplett Chief of Staff https://www.linkedin.com/in/martintriplett/ Martin is a veteran industry expert with more than 25 years of experience working for leading data center and telecommunications providers. He has deep expertise in network and customer operations, IT and business processes, product management and global market expansion. As Chief of Staff, Martin plays a pivotal role in driving strategic initiatives, optimizing operations and creating cross-functional alignment. He is a key advisor to the executive team, ensuring seamless execution of the companyâs mission to deliver innovative IT infrastructure. Michael Green General Counsel https://www.linkedin.com/in/michael-green-04585826/ As General Counsel to Edged, Michael is responsible for overseeing all legal, compliance and regulatory matters and plays a critical role in helping the team meet its strategic objectives. Michael has more than a decade of experience advising on real estate investments, mergers and acquisitions, joint ventures, and debt and equity financings. Prior to joining Edged, Michael was in-house counsel for a multinational corporation with substantial private investment activity and a member of the mergers and acquisitions group at a leading international law firm. Marcie Kaplan Vice President & Head of Marketing https://www.linkedin.com/in/marcie-kaplan-890a433/ Marcie is a seasoned marketing leader with over 20 years of experience, including deep expertise in the rapidly evolving data center and technology industry. As Vice President and Head of Marketing, Marcie is responsible for driving innovative marketing growth strategies and overseeing key functions including demand generation, product marketing, content strategy, channel marketing and external communications to support the overarching go-to-market vision. Brittany Marley Vice President of Sales https://www.linkedin.com/in/brittany-marley-b37b756/ Brit is an experienced sales executive responsible for solving complex infrastructure requirements for hyperscale, cloud, and content clients. She provides technical expertise in AI, hybrid cloud, edge and subsea systems with an emphasis on sustainability and renewable energy. Brit brings more than 20 years of sales and business development experience to her work at Edged, having managed partnerships with many of the largest cloud and hyperscale clients in the industry. Julian Bastiani Vice President of Operations https://www.linkedin.com/in/julian-endeavour/ Julian is a seasoned operations and engineering leader with more than 15 years of experience successfully designing and executing mission critical logistics facilities. He brings proven expertise in project planning and a keen ability to integrate complex technology solutions and reliability initiatives. As the Director of Operations, Julian oversees the operational strategy and implementation for the companyâs fast growing sustainable data center portfolio, ensuring top-tier performance, energy efficiency and uptime. Frank Scandariato Vice President of Construction https://www.linkedin.com/in/frank-scandariato-92746831/ Frank is an industry veteran in mission critical infrastructure for large scale construction projects who is leading the rapid rollout of the Edged platform in North America. He has led the design and construction of multibillion dollar projects that span a multitude of industries. Frank brings to bear his formidable background in engineering, technology, and infrastructure design â as well as his extensive leadership and project management skills. A few examples of his projects include data centers for eBay, IBM, Royal Bank of Canada, Lenovo, and Telus, and airline terminals for John F. Kennedy International and Laguardia Airports. Joe Bush Vice President of Investments & Capital Formation https://www.linkedin.com/in/joe-bush-54b7aa44/ Joe is an investment professional with more than a decade of experience in infrastructure private equity and investment banking. He is focused on driving platform growth through capital formation, corporate development and strategic planning. Prior to joining Edged, Joe executed over $8 billion of equity investments in digital infrastructure and worked with power and utility clients on M&A transactions and strategic financings. Christian Dicker Senior Director of Sales https://www.linkedin.com/in/christiandicker/ Christian is a senior sales professional with 20+ years of sales and marketing experience in IT infrastructure. He has spent his career involved in many areas of IT, including data center infrastructure, site selection, deep network background, new market development, and business case development. He holds a unique background successfully supporting sales for hyperscale and Fortune 100 Enterprise. â Name Name Title A veteran entrepreneur and builder in the data center industry, Jake focuses on new approaches to improve infrastructure deployment for IT and sustainable energy. Jake has over 30 years of experience building and operating data centers and mission critical infrastructure for companies such as Skanska, IBM, Telus, Goldman Sacs and other industry leaders. As Founder and CEO of Endeavour, Jake is overseeing the rollout of a new generation of grid-interactive edge infrastructure. Start saving with green IT. From the moment you enter one of our “Black lit” courses, you have left “the real world” and have entered a dizzying universe full of fun, imagination, and activity. You will be immersed in a kaleidoscope of dazzling “Glow-in-the-Dark” colors, images and sounds, rocking your senses in extraordinary and unbelievable ways. LET'S DO THIS! BOOK YOUR TEE TIME You can request your tee time online by clicking your desired location on the link below. Reservations are required to avoid long wait periods. Walk-ins are welcome, subject to availability. MAKE A RESERVATION Planning a large party? Please visit our Parties & Events page or call us directly. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! FIND A PUT T ING EDGE NEAR YOU Each Putting Edge venue features a unique glow-in-the-dark golf course , a glow-in-the-dark arcade and lobby featuring images and sounds, rocking your senses in unordinary, unbelievable ways. Remember At Put t ing Edge, the weather is guaranteed! FIND A PUTTING EDGE NEAR YOU Nepean, Ontario Scarborough, Ontario Vaughan, Ontario Whitby, Ontario Halifax, Nova Scotia Montreal (Centre-Ville), Quebec Laval (Centropolis), Quebec Ville Saint-Laurent (Spheretech), Quebec Fort Lauderdale, United States Novi, United States Orlando, United States Fort Lauderdale, United States Inside Xtreme Action Park, 5300 Powerline Rd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309 VIEW MAP Our Store Opens at 11:00 am Monday - Thursday 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Friday - Saturday 11:00 am - 12:00 am Sunday 11:00 am - 10:00 pm MAKE A RESERVATION PLAN A PARTY FAR FROM THE ORDINARY! Our party planners are committed to making sure every detail meets perfection – from finding the best date to facilitating all of your special requests. You focus on the fun, we’ll handle the rest. Birthday Parties Youth Group Events Celebrations Company Events AN EXPERIENCE LIKE NO OTHER! IT'S LIKE TRAVELLING TO ANOTHER PLANET FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS See our answers to frequently asked questions below. But keep in mind that one can never truly prepare for the unordinary. That would make things way too ordinary. Are all Putting Edge locations the same? Each course has a unique 18 hole golf course design with a variety of arcade games and furnishings. How long does it take to play? A round of mini golf will take approximately 45 minutes to play, however you should allow yourself extra time to enjoy our arcade games as well Is everyone required to pay the admission price to enter the golf course? Yes. Our admission policy intentionally promotes family visits by allowing a child 3 years and under to play for free when accompanied with a paid General Admission. An exception is for group leaders who are supervising their pre-booked event. Are you wheelchair accessible? Our Lobby, Arcade and Party Rooms are fully accessible. Unfortunately our multi-level golf course is not. Do You Serve Alcohol? Alcoholic beverages can be served during private events by most caterers. All Quebec locations sell alcohol. Is your game suitable for all ages? We recommend the game for ages 9 to 99. How many people can play together at the same time? In order to keep a consistent rate of play on the course, we allow a maximum of 4 players to play together on one hole. Larger groups would be separated into two or more groups who would be playing on consecutive holes on the course. As an example, a group of 6 players would be separated into 2 groups of 3 players. Each group would play on separate holes. Are reservations required? Can I book online? Yes. You can request a tee time by clicking the "make a reservation" link at the top of the page. Do you serve food and beverages? Some of our locations have an assortment of snacks, bottled soft drinks, and frozen beverages. For our Golf N’ Gala package guests may bring fully prepared food or order delivery. Please see our Group Event or Birthday Party page for more details. Do you host Private Facility Rentals or events outside of regular operating hours? Yes, we will close to the public so your group can have exclusive use of our facility. We will also open at any time for your private event. Please contact our event planners at info@puttingedge.com to discuss how we can make it an unforgettable experience for all. He was also Chairman and Managing director of the publicly held Timex Group India Limited from October 2000 onwards. Mr. Kapoor started his professional career in 1987 with Nestle India Limited. He later worked with Bausch & Lomb, where he was part of the startup team that launched RayBan sunglasses and the Bausch & Lomb vision care range in India. He subsequently went on to manage the overseas marketing territories of Russia, Ukraine and East Africa in addition to the SAARC region. In 1996, Mr. Kapoor relocated to Thailand as the Country Manager for Bausch & Lomb and Commercial Director for South East Asia and the SAARC region. He has a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics from the University of Delhi and a Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) from the Indian Institute of Management (IIM), Ahmedabad. IT'S LIKE TRAVELLING TO ANOTHER PLANET FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS See our answers to frequently asked questions below. But keep in mind that one can never truly prepare for the unordinary. That would make things way too ordinary. Are all Putting Edge locations the same? Each course has a unique 18 hole golf course design with a variety of arcade games and furnishings. How long does it take to play? A round of mini golf will take approximately 45 minutes to play, however you should allow yourself extra time to enjoy our arcade games as well Is everyone required to pay the admission price to enter the golf course? Yes. Our admission policy intentionally promotes family visits by allowing a child 3 years and under to play for free when accompanied with a paid General Admission. An exception is for group leaders who are supervising their pre-booked event. Are you wheelchair accessible? Our Lobby, Arcade and Party Rooms are fully accessible. Unfortunately our multi-level golf course is not. Do You Serve Alcohol? Alcoholic beverages can be served during private events by most caterers. All Quebec locations sell alcohol. Is your game suitable for all ages? We recommend the game for ages 9 to 99. How many people can play together at the same time? In order to keep a consistent rate of play on the course, we allow a maximum of 4 players to play together on one hole. Larger groups would be separated into two or more groups who would be playing on consecutive holes on the course. As an example, a group of 6 players would be separated into 2 groups of 3 players. Each group would play on separate holes. Are reservations required? Can I book online? Yes. You can request a tee time by clicking the "make a reservation" link at the top of the page. Do you serve food and beverages? Some of our locations have an assortment of snacks, bottled soft drinks, and frozen beverages. For our Golf N’ Gala package guests may bring fully prepared food or order delivery. Please see our Group Event or Birthday Party page for more details. Do you host Private Facility Rentals or events outside of regular operating hours? Yes, we will close to the public so your group can have exclusive use of our facility. We will also open at any time for your private event. Please contact our event planners at info@puttingedge.com to discuss how we can make it an unforgettable experience for all.
